items: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your weight evenly distributed between both feet.
Lift your left foot off the ground and balance on your right foot.
Keeping your back straight, hinge forward at the hips and lower your torso towards the ground.
As you lower your torso, lift your left leg behind you until it is parallel to the ground.
Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps, then switch sides and repeat with your right leg.
